SELECT A.ID AS id , A.TITLE AS title , A.CONTENT AS content , A.IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl , A.MEMBER_ID AS memberId , B.NICKNAME AS nickname , C.NAME AS rankName , A.CREATED_AT AS createdAt , A.VISIBILITY AS visibility , A.STATUS AS status , A.REJECT_REASON AS rejectReason , A.LIKE_COUNT AS likeCount , A.COMMENT_COUNT AS commentCount FROM CAREER_INFO_POST A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.ID JOIN MEMBER_RANK C ON B.RANK_ID = C.ID WHERE A.ID = #{postId}
AND A.VISIBILITY = #{visibility}

SELECT A.ID AS commentId , A.PARENT_ID AS parentId , A.POST_ID AS postId , A.MEMBER_ID AS memberId , B.NICKNAME AS nickname , C.NAME AS rankName , A.CONTENT AS content , A.CREATED_AT AS createdAt , A.UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt , A.VISIBILITY AS visibility FROM CAREER_INFO_COMMENT A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.ID JOIN MEMBER_RANK C ON B.RANK_ID = C.ID WHERE A.POST_ID = #{postId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN A.PARENT_ID IS NULL THEN A.ID ELSE A.PARENT_ID END ASC, A.ID ASC
